AT.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
AT.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ ist ein Tower-Defence-Spiel, in dem du Tikiman, den Waldhüter spielst. Horden von gefährlichen Monstern ziehen durch dein Reich und wollen deine Nachkommenschaft wegmampfen – du musst sie beschützen! Indem du Waffentürme an strategisch wichtigen Punkten aufstellst, kannst du die Eindringlinge zurückschlagen und die Kleinen retten. Dir stehen zahlreiche Türme zur Verfügung: Pfeiltürme, Kanonentürme, Flugabwehrtürme, Eistürme, Feuertürme, Lasertürme, Teslatürme, Mörsertürme, ganz besondere Power-ups und vieles mehr! Sammele Schätze, um dein Arsenal zu erweitern und neue Türme zu kaufen – endlose Wellen an Monstern haben es auf deine Babys abgesehen, und du musst stets kampfbereit sein! Reise über 3 unterschiedliche Inseln mit 47 einzigartigen Umgebungen, um Tikimans Nachkommen vor schlauen Monstern zu beschützen, die über Land und durch die Luft angreifen. Spiele im lokalen Koop gemeinsam mit einem Freund für ein unvergessliches geteiltes Erlebnis. Erlebe die geheimnisvolle Insel Tum-Tum, die zufällige Levels generiert – für einen nahezu unendlichen Wiederspielwert!

AU.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
AU.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ is a tower defence game where you play as Tikiman, the Forest Defender. He’s in trouble, with hordes of monsters sweeping through his realm, hoping to chow down on his offspring – and it’s up to you to defend them! By placing weapon towers at strategic points around the landscape, you can destroy the invaders and save the little ones. Choose from a whole host of towers: Arrow Towers, Cannon Towers, Anti-Air Towers, Ice Towers, Fire Towers, Laser Towers, Tesla Towers, Mortar Towers, special power ups and more! Collect treasure along the way to build up your arsenal and pay for new towers – countless waves of monsters are out to get the babies, so you need to be prepared to battle! Travel across 3 distinct islands, spanning 47 unique environments to protect Tikiman’s offspring from clever monsters that attack by land and air. Play together with a friend with local co-op for a memorable shared experience. There is also the mysterious Tum-Tum Island that randomly generates levels for near infinite replayability!

BG.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
BG.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ is a tower defence game where you play as Tikiman, the Forest Defender. BE.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
BE.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ est un jeu de Tower defense dans lequel vous jouez le rôle de Tikiman, le défenseur de la forêt. Il a des problèmes, car des hordes de monstres déferlent sur son royaume, dans l'espoir de dévorer sa progéniture, et c'est à vous de les défendre ! En plaçant des tours armées aux points stratégiques de la carte, vous pourrez détruire les envahisseurs et sauver ses petits. Faites votre choix parmi toute une panoplie de tours : tours de flèches, tours canon, tours antiaériennes, tours de glace, tours de feu, tours laser, tours Tesla, tours mortier, en plus d'améliorations spéciales et d'autres surprises ! Ramassez des trésors en chemin pour construire votre arsenal et acheter de nouvelles tours. D'innombrables vagues de monstres comptent bien mettre leur patte sur les bébés, alors préparez-vous au combat ! Voyagez à travers 3 îles distinctes qui s'étendent sur 47 environnements uniques pour protéger la progéniture de Tikiman contre les monstres sournois qui attaquent par voie terrestre et aérienne. Jouez avec un ami en coopération locale pour une expérience commune memorable. Vous trouverez également la mystérieuse île Tum-Tum, qui génère aléatoirement des niveaux pour une rejouabilité presque infinie !

ES.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
ES.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ es un juego de defensa del territorio en el que encarnas a Tikiman, el defensor del bosque. Tikiman afronta un grave problema: hay hordas de monstruos vagando por su reino con el objetivo de comerse a los niños. ¡Será tu deber defenderlos! Coloca torres con armas en puntos estratégicos del escenario para destruir a los invasores y salvar a los pequeños. Tendrás un amplio abanico de torres entre las que elegir, cada una con su propio armamento: flechas, cañones, antiaéreas, hielo, fuego, láser, Tesla, morteros, objetos potenciadores ¡y mucho más! Recoge tesoros mientras creas tu arsenal y paga por tener torres nuevas. ¡Tendrás que estar preparado para el combate, ya que habrá infinidad de monstruos que intentarán llevarse a los bebés! Viaja a lo largo de 3 islas distintas, con 47 entornos únicos, y protege a los descendientes de Tikiman. ¡Esos monstruos tan inteligentes te atacarán por tierra y por aire! Disfruta con un amigo del cooperativo local y viviréis una experiencia inolvidable. También podrás visitar la misteriosa isla de Tum-Tum, que generará niveles aleatorios. ¡Podrás jugar eternamente!

IT.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
IT.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ è un gioco difensivo del genere "tower defence" in cui vestirai i panni di Tikiman, il difensore della foresta. Tikiman è nei guai perché orde di mostri hanno invaso il suo regno e vogliono papparsi i suoi piccoli... Quindi toccherà a te difenderli! Piazzando delle torrette armate sui punti strategici del territorio potrai distruggere gli invasori e salvare i tuoi piccoli. Scegli tra una varietà di torrette: Arrow, Cannon, Anti-Air, Ice, Fire, Laser, Tesla e Mortar), poteri speciali e un sacco di altre cose! Raccogli il tesoro mentre costruisci il tuo arsenale e acquista nuove torrette: ondate infinite di mostri vogliono i tuoi piccoli, quindi devi prepararti alla battaglia! Avventurati in 3 isole diverse, con 47 ambientazioni originali per proteggere i pargoli di Tikiman dai mostri astuti che attaccano per vie terrestri e aeree. Gioca con un amico in cooperativa locale per condividere un'esperienza indimenticabile. Scopri la misteriosa isola Tum-Tum che dà vita a livelli casuali da ripetere all'infinito!

NL.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
NL.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ is een tower defence-spel waarin je speelt alsTikiman, de verdediger van het woud. Hij zit in de penarie, want er trekken horden monsters door zijn rijk die hun tanden in zijn kinderen willen zetten. Aan jou de taak om ze te verdedigen! Door verdedigingstorens op strategische punten in het landschap te plaatsen, kun je de aanvallers tegenhouden en de kleintjes redden. Kies uit een hele reeks torens: pijltorens, kanontorens, luchtdoeltorens, ijstorens, vuurtorens, lasertorens, Tesla-torens, mortiertorens, speciale powerups en meer! Verzamel onderweg schatten om je arsenaal op te bouwen en nieuwe torens aan te schaffen. Er komen ontelbare golven monsters op de kleintjes af, dus wees goed voorbereid op een harde strijd! Reis over 3 verschillende eilanden met 47 omgevingen om Tikimans kinderen te beschermen tegen slimme monsters die over land of via de lucht aanvallen. Speel met een vriend in lokale coöp voor een gedeelde beleving die je niet snel vergeet. En dan is er nog het mysterieuze Tum-Tum-eiland dat willekeurige levels genereert, zodat je hem vrijwel oneindig vaak kunt herspelen!

Choose from a whole host of towers: Arrow Towers, Cannon Towers, Anti-Air Towers, Ice Towers, Fire Towers, Laser Towers, Tesla Towers, Mortar Towers, special power ups and more! Collect treasure along the way to build up your arsenal and pay for new towers – countless waves of monsters are out to get the babies, so you need to be prepared to battle! Travel across 3 distinct islands, spanning 47 unique environments to protect Tikiman’s offspring from clever monsters that attack by land and air. Play together with a friend with local co-op for a memorable shared experience. There is also the mysterious Tum-Tum Island that randomly generates levels for near infinite replayability!

PL.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
PL.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ is a tower defence game where you play as Tikiman, the Forest Defender. He’s in trouble, with hordes of monsters sweeping through his realm, hoping to chow down on his offspring – and it’s up to you to defend them! By placing weapon towers at strategic points around the landscape, you can destroy the invaders and save the little ones. Choose from a whole host of towers: Arrow Towers, Cannon Towers, Anti-Air Towers, Ice Towers, Fire Towers, Laser Towers, Tesla Towers, Mortar Towers, special power ups and more! Collect treasure along the way to build up your arsenal and pay for new towers – countless waves of monsters are out to get the babies, so you need to be prepared to battle! Travel across 3 distinct islands, spanning 47 unique environments to protect Tikiman’s offspring from clever monsters that attack by land and air. Play together with a friend with local co-op for a memorable shared experience. There is also the mysterious Tum-Tum Island that randomly generates levels for near infinite replayability!

PT.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
PT.description:
O PixelJunk Monsters™ é um jogo de defesa de torres onde jogas na pele de Tikiman, o Defensor da Floresta. Tikiman está em sarilhos, com hordas de monstros a varrerem o seu reino em busca de devorarem a sua família. Cabe-te a ti defendê-los! Ao posicionares torres com armas em pontos estratégicos, poderás eliminar os invasores e salvar os pequeninos. Podes escolher entre uma grande variedade de torres: Arrow Towers, Cannon Towers, Anti-Air Towers, Ice Towers, Fire Towers, Laser Towers, Tesla Towers, Mortar Towers, aumentos de poder especiais, e muito mais! Pelo caminho, coleciona tesouros para aumentares o teu arsenal e poderes pagar novas torres - são incontáveis as hordas de monstros que querem apanhar os bebés, pelo que precisas de te preparar para a guerra! Viaja por 3 ilhas diferentes, com 47 ambientes únicos para proteger a família do Tikiman contra monstros espertos que atacam por terra e pelo ar. Joga com um amigo numa cooperação local, para uma memorável experiência partilhada.
  • Existe também a ilha Tum-Tum, que cria níveis de forma aleatória para poderes jogar vezes sem conta!

RU.name: PIXELJUNK™ MONSTERS
RU.description: PixelJunk Monsters™ это игра жанра защиты башни, где вы играете за Тикимана, – Защитника Леса. Он попал в беду. Орды монстров рыскают по королевству в поисках его отпрысков. Ваша задача – защитить их! Вы можете уничтожить захватчиков и защитить своих малышей путем стратегического размещения орудийных башен на карте. Вы можете выбирать из целого ряда башен: башни со стрелами, башни с пушками, противовоздушные башни, ледяные башни, огненные башни, башни с лазерами, минометные башни, кроме того есть специальные улучшения и многое другое! Собирайте сокровища и наращивайте свой арсенал, покупая новые башни. Бесконечные волны монстров будут пытаться добраться до ваших детей. Вы должны быть готовы к битве! Путешествуйте по 3 разным островам с 47 уникальными окружениями, чтобы защитить потомство Тикимана от умных монстров, атакующих с земли и воздуха. Играйте вместе с другом в режиме совместного прохождения по локальной сети и делитесь незабываемыми моментами. Тут даже есть загадочный остров Тум-Тум, который генерирует новые уровни случайным образом, делая игру практически бесконечной!
